attributes.action: recognise Spastic Paraplegics with the same regards as other neurological sufferers, like MS, MND, ME.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a sufferer of Spastic Paraplegia and Fibromyalgia I am in constant pain. However there is no information or agencies to help those of us with Spastic Paraplegia in the UK. There should be an organisation to support those of us with the condition, as we have nowhere to turn for help and advice relating to our condition both mental, physical, and financial.
